related.meaning: to take (seat, position, course, office, etc.)

lessons.japanese: パーティーが来週の土曜日すなわち８月２５日に行われる。
lessons.english: A party will be held next Saturday, that is to say, on August 25th.

lessons.japanese: それは３年後、すなわち１９６５年に起こった。
lessons.english: It happened three years later, that is in 1965.

lessons.japanese: それは１週間前、すなわち４月２日に行われた。
lessons.english: It was due a week ago, namely on April second.

lessons.japanese: この次の火曜日、すなわち９月１０日に君に会いたい。
lessons.english: I will see you on next Tuesday, that is to say, the 10th of September.
